an5.1:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
an5.1:3.2: ‘saddhabalena samannagata bhavissama sekhabalena, hiribalena samannagata bhavissama sekhabalena, ottappabalena samannagata bhavissama sekhabalena, viriyabalena samannagata bhavissama sekhabalena, pannabalena samannagata bhavissama sekhabalena’ti.
an5.1:3.5: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
